subject: refactor(contact): restructure contact layout and fix chart sizing
body:

GitHub links move to the site footer, the interest form moves to after

Also increase chart iframe height (h-80/sm:h-96) so embedded charts
are fully visible without scrolling, and tighten chart title spacing.
